org.openlcb.can
Class MessageBuilder

java.lang.Object
  org.openlcb.can.MessageBuilder

public class MessageBuilder
extends Object

Converts CAN frame messages to regular messages and vice-versa.

In general, the connection is one-to-one, but sometimes (datagram expansion) more than one frame will be created.

Author:
Bob Jacobsen Copyright 2010

Constructor Summary
MessageBuilder(AliasMap map)
          The provided AliasMap will be updated as inbound frames are processed.

Constructor Detail

MessageBuilder

public MessageBuilder(AliasMap map)
The provided AliasMap will be updated as inbound frames are processed.

Method Detail

processFrame

public List<Message> processFrame(CanFrame f)
Accept a frame, and convert to a standard OpenLCB Message object. The returned Message is fully initialized with content, and the original frame can be dropped. The List is always returned, even if empty.

processMessage

public List<OpenLcbCanFrame> processMessage(Message msg)
Accept an OpenLCB Message, and convert to a standard frame object. The returned frame(s) are fully initialized with content, and the original frame can be dropped. The List is always returned, and should never be empty.
